scenes.video_prompt:
Style: Modern documentary style, shot on digital cinema camera with natural grain, warm cinematic color grade with intense golden hour amber tones, authentic urban professional aesthetic, realistic natural lighting with harsh glare effects

Scene Description: The Hero - Urban Professional exits through glass doors of a sleek modern office building at sunset. They are a 30-year-old professional with warm medium-brown skin tone with olive undertones, thick dark brown hair in modern professional cut, wearing a tailored charcoal gray blazer over crisp white dress shirt with top button undone. They carry a tan leather messenger bag where SunVue Aviator Classic sunglasses are tucked inside (gold-toned frames with gray-green polarized lenses partially visible). The office building exterior features floor-to-ceiling glass curtain walls with steel frames reflecting intense golden hour sunlight. As they step onto the bustling urban street, harsh bright sunlight hits their face directly, creating uncomfortable glare. They squint intensely against the brightness, eyes partially closed, facial expression showing clear discomfort. Their free hand reaches toward their face instinctively to shield against the glare. Body language shows hesitation and tension - shoulders slightly hunched, uncertain posture. The city street behind them is washed out with harsh overexposed highlights and blown-out bright areas, buildings with indistinct details in the challenging brightness.

Cinematography:
Camera shot: Medium-wide shot at eye level, capturing character from waist up with office building glass exterior visible behind them and urban street in background
Camera motion: Slow steady dolly forward, following the character as they exit building and step into street
Lighting: Harsh intense golden hour sunlight from right side creating strong directional light, uncomfortable glare washing across face and glass building surfaces, overexposed highlights with blown-out bright areas, natural lens flare
Mood: Uncomfortable and hesitant, overwhelmed by harsh light, uncertain and slightly frustrated

Actions:
- Character pushes through glass doors and steps outside (0-1.5 sec)
- Harsh sunlight hits face, they immediately squint with eyes partially closed (1.5-3 sec)
- Hand reaches up toward face to shield from glare, body language shows discomfort (3-4.5 sec)
- Takes two steps forward into street, still squinting, hesitant expression visible (4.5-6 sec)
scenes.audio_background: Ambient urban soundscape with subtle tension, low frequency modern electronic undertones, 80 BPM, minimal instrumentation with soft synthesizer pad building slowly, slight dissonant edge creating mild discomfort, professional corporate atmosphere with underlying unease, clean production

scenes.video_prompt:
Style: Modern documentary style, shot on digital cinema camera with natural grain, warm cinematic color grade with golden hour amber tones, authentic urban fashion photography aesthetic, realistic natural lighting, slight slow-motion quality for emphasis

SHOT 1 (0-2 seconds - The Confident Stranger):
Scene: The Confident Stranger - a striking 28-year-old Black individual with deep rich brown skin tone, athletic lean build, short textured fade haircut showing tight coils, wearing bold oversized square black acetate statement sunglasses with thick dramatic frames - strides purposefully past camera on urban street. They wear a fitted black turtleneck, tailored camel wool overcoat with perfect drape, dark fitted trousers. The urban street at golden hour shows harsh bright sunlight creating geometric shadows. Their walk is commanding and effortless - shoulders back, confident energy radiating.
Cinematography: Medium shot at eye level, slightly from the side, camera pans smoothly to follow their confident stride
Lighting: Golden hour sunlight from left creating warm rim light on profile, strong confident presence in harsh light conditions
Action: Stranger enters frame left, strides confidently across frame toward right with purposeful commanding walk, bold sunglasses catching light, passes close to camera

SHOT 2 (2-4 seconds - The Hero Watches):
Scene: The Hero - Urban Professional watches the stranger pass, inspired expression crossing their face. They are the same 30-year-old with warm medium-brown skin, dark brown hair, charcoal blazer. Their hesitant squinting expression transforms to curiosity and inspiration as they observe the stranger's confidence. Their hand moves to their tan leather messenger bag.
Cinematography: Medium close-up at eye level, camera static on The Hero's face and upper body
Lighting: Golden hour sunlight from right still creating glare, but Hero's expression shifts from discomfort to inspiration
Action: Hero's eyes follow the stranger (still squinting), facial expression transitions from discomfort to inspired realization, hand reaches into messenger bag

SHOT 3 (4-6 seconds - The Hero Slides On Aviators):
Scene: The Hero's hand pulls out SunVue Aviator Classic sunglasses (gold-toned double-bridge metal frame, teardrop-shaped polarized gray-green gradient lenses) from bag and slides them onto their face with confident, deliberate motion. As the frames settle on their face, their entire demeanor shifts - shoulders straighten, squint disappears, subtle confident smile emerges. Thin gold temples catch sunset light with warm metallic gleam as they extend to ears.
Cinematography: Close-up on face and hands, slight upward angle emphasizing emerging confidence
Lighting: Golden hour sunlight catching gold metal frames with warm gleam, lens surfaces showing subtle reflections
Action: Hand lifts Aviators from bag, brings them to face, slides them on with smooth deliberate motion, frames settle perfectly, character's posture transforms to confidence
scenes.audio_background: Uplifting modern electronic music beginning, 95 BPM, clean crisp synthesizer melody emerging, warm bass foundation starting to build, inspirational ascending chord progression, subtle string pad underneath, energy lifting from uncertainty to determination, clean professional production with hope and confidence building

scenes.video_prompt:
Style: Modern documentary style transitioning to hyper-vivid color-enhanced cinematography, shot on digital cinema camera with natural grain, color grade dramatically shifting from washed-out amber to rich deeply saturated vivid tones, realistic natural lighting transforming from harsh glare to perfect polarized clarity, cinematic VFX melt transition effect

Scene Description: The Hero - Urban Professional (now wearing SunVue Aviator Classic sunglasses with gold double-bridge frames and gray-green polarized lenses) adjusts the Aviators on their face as a stunning visual transformation occurs. They are the same 30-year-old with warm medium-brown skin, dark brown hair, charcoal blazer, but now with confident posture, shoulders back, relaxed facial expression. As their hands settle the frames perfectly on their nose bridge and the polarized lenses align with their eyes, the urban street environment undergoes a dramatic 'melt transition' - the harsh washed-out glare literally appears to liquefy and dissolve away like water or melting glass. The visual effect shows harsh bright overexposed areas softening and flowing downward, revealing the transformed world underneath. Within 2 seconds, the urban street shifts from harsh golden hour glare (blown-out highlights, hazy indistinct details, uncomfortable brightness) to crystalline sharp focus with polarized clarity (rich saturated colors - deep blues in sky, vibrant reds and oranges in storefronts, vivid greens in urban plantings, razor-sharp architectural details, balanced exposure with no glare). Every element becomes more alive and dimensional - neon murals explode with intense color, building edges become crisp and defined, window reflections show clear detail. The Hero's eyes are subtly visible through the lenses with enhanced luminous quality (slightly brighter, more present). Their confident expression shows satisfaction and relief.

Cinematography:
Camera shot: Medium close-up on The Hero's face and upper body, slightly from below to emphasize confidence emerging
Camera motion: Slow push-in toward face as transformation occurs, steady and deliberate
Lighting: Lighting quality transforms dramatically during melt transition - begins with harsh intense golden hour sunlight creating glare and overexposure, transitions seamlessly to perfectly balanced golden hour with rich warm tones, controlled highlights, shadows with retained detail, no glare
Mood: Transformative and revelatory, satisfaction and relief, world opening up with clarity, empowering confidence emerging

Actions:
- Hero's hands make final adjustment to Aviator frames on nose bridge, lenses align with eyes (0-1 sec)
- Melt transition VFX begins - harsh glare starts to liquefy and flow downward like water (1-2 sec)
- Glare dissolves away revealing vivid saturated colors and sharp details underneath, world transforms to crystalline clarity (2-4 sec)
- Hero's confident expression shows satisfaction, subtle smile, eyes visible through lenses with luminous quality (4-5 sec)
- Final frame shows transformed street in full polarized glory, Hero centered and confident (5-6 sec)
scenes.audio_background: Cinematic transformation sound design layered with music, ethereal whoosh and shimmer effects during melt transition at 1-2 seconds, uplifting modern electronic music at 100 BPM with rich full orchestration emerging, soaring synthesizer lead, warm string ensemble, powerful bass foundation, major key inspirational chord progression, energy crescendoing to triumphant confident tone, cinematic production with VFX emphasis

The urban street shows crystalline clarity with rich saturated colors, razor-sharp architectural details. As they turn, their aviator lenses catch and reflect a scene of street jazz musicians - a saxophone player and upright bass player performing on the corner, instruments gleaming with golden light, vibrant colors of their clothing and instrument cases. The reflection in the polarized lenses is clear and visible, showing the musicians in beautiful detail. Their aviator lenses reflect a vibrant neon art mural on a building wall - electric blues, hot pinks, bright yellows creating an abstract street art design that pops with intense saturated color. The polarized lenses show the mural with extraordinary clarity and color richness. Hero's face shows slight smile of satisfaction, eyes with enhanced luminous gaze effect visible through lenses. The crystalline sharp urban environment shows rich colors and perfect dimensional clarity.

scenes.video_prompt:
Style: Modern premium product commercial style, shot on digital cinema camera with natural grain, rich cinematic color grade with warm golden tones and deep shadows, hyper-detailed macro photography aesthetic, realistic natural lighting with perfect clarity

Scene Description: Extreme close-up macro shot of SunVue Aviator Classic sunglasses temple arm, focusing on the elegant 'SunVue' logo laser-etched in serif font into the warm gold-toned brushed metal surface. The Hero - Urban Professional is wearing the glasses (their face visible in soft focus in background), showing the temple arm extending from behind their ear. The logo etching shows dimensional depth with fine precise lines catching light. Behind the temple, the edge of the polarized gray-green gradient lens is visible with subtle light refraction. In the deep background (beautiful bokeh), the transformed urban city glows softly out of focus - warm golden lights, blurred vibrant colors of storefronts and neon signs creating dreamy light orbs, crystalline evening atmosphere. As camera holds on the logo detail, elegant text overlay fades in over the bottom third of frame: 'SunVue Aviator Classic — Never Hide' in clean modern sans-serif font (white with subtle shadow for readability). The macro focus is perfect on the logo, showing every detail of metal texture, etching precision, and premium craftsmanship. Warm medium-brown skin tone with natural texture visible in soft focus behind glasses.

Cinematography:
Camera shot: Extreme macro close-up on temple arm logo, shallow depth of field isolating logo in sharp focus with background heavily blurred
Camera motion: Slow subtle push-in on logo, then holds steady as text overlay appears
Lighting: Warm golden hour light from left creating subtle shadows in etched logo text for dimensional depth, soft rim light on gold metal surface, bokeh city lights glowing warmly in background
Mood: Premium, confident, aspirational, final statement of brand promise and personal empowerment

Actions:
- Camera slowly pushes in on SunVue logo, revealing intricate etching detail (0-2 sec)
- Camera holds steady on logo in perfect sharp focus, metal texture and dimensional etching clearly visible (2-3.5 sec)
- Text overlay fades in smoothly: 'SunVue Aviator Classic — Never Hide' (3.5-4.5 sec)
- Hold final frame with logo and tagline visible, city glowing softly behind (4.5-6 sec)
